alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Refugio; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 11 at 10:43AM CDT until May 14 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Guadalupe River Near Bloomington affecting Victoria, Refugio and Calhoun Counties. For the Guadalupe River...including Victoria, Bloomington...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Guadalupe River Near Bloomington. * WHEN...Until Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 26.0 feet, Irrigation and oil well pumps, tank batteries, and equipment in the lower flood plain below Victoria flood. Livestock are cut off, may have to be fed by boat, and could drown. Homes downstream above Highway 35 on the left bank are cut off. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 23.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 25.1 feet late tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Below are the latest river stages and stage forecasts: Fld Observed Forecasts (10 am) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Mon Tue Guadalupe River Bloomington 20.0 23.7 Thu 9 am 24.9 22.7 18.3 15.7 14.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/crp.
